subScenes.name: 找商品位置
subScenes.description: 询问牛奶和燕麦片在哪个区域

qaPairs.speakerText: Excuse me, where can I find the milk?

responses.text: It's in the dairy section, right next to the eggs.
responses.text_cn: 在乳制品区，就在鸡蛋旁边。

responses.text: Just head left past the bread, you'll see it.
responses.text_cn: 往前走，穿过面包区就看到了。

responses.text: Dairy aisle.

qaPairs.usageNote: 常用在询问商品位置时，简洁礼貌

qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你们有无麸质燕麦片吗？

responses.text: Yeah, they're in the health food aisle, near the nuts.
responses.text_cn: 有的，在健康食品区，坚果旁边。

responses.text: I'm not sure, but try the organic section.
responses.text_cn: 我不确定，试试有机食品区。

responses.text: Check the top shelf.

qaPairs.usageNote: 适合询问特殊需求商品，语气自然

subScenes.name: 确认计量单位
subScenes.description: 确认商品是按公斤还是按袋卖

qaPairs.speakerText: Is this rice sold by the kilo or by the bag?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这个米是按公斤卖还是按袋卖？

responses.text: It's $2.99 per kilo, or you can get a 5kg bag for $12.
responses.text_cn: 每公斤2.99美元，或者5公斤装12美元。

responses.text: By the bag only — we don't do loose rice.
Kilo.

qaPairs.usageNote: 购物时确认价格单位的关键提问

qaPairs.speakerText: How much is this yogurt? Per cup or per pack?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这个酸奶是按杯还是按盒算？

responses.text: It's $1.50 per cup, but the 6-pack's cheaper at $8.
responses.text_cn: 每杯1.5美元，但6装只要8美元更划算。

responses.text: Per pack — each pack has four cups.
The label says per cup.

qaPairs.usageNote: 避免结账时价格误解，必须确认

subScenes.name: 询问促销活动
subScenes.description: 确认商品是否有折扣或赠品

qaPairs.speakerText: Is there a deal on these canned beans?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这些罐装豆子有优惠吗？

responses.text: Yeah, buy two, get one free — right now!
responses.text_cn: 有，买二送一，现在就有效！

responses.text: Not today, but they were on sale last week.
responses.text_cn: 今天没有，但上周有打折。

responses.text: Nope, regular price.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用‘deal’更口语，适合快速确认促销

qaPairs.speakerText: Do you get a free bag with this purchase?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 买这个会送免费购物袋吗？

responses.text: Only if you spend over $20 — you're just under.
We don't give free bags anymore — it's 10 cents now.
responses.text_cn: 不送免费袋了，现在要10美分。

responses.text: Sure, here you go.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用于确认环保政策或赠品规则

subScenes.name: 找收银台
subScenes.description: 询问最近的收银台在哪里

responses.text: Right at the front, next to the doors.
Turn left at the snacks, then straight ahead.
responses.text_cn: 在零食区左转，然后直走。

responses.text: Over there.

qaPairs.usageNote: 简洁问法，适合结账前急用

responses.text: Yeah, two lanes just past the magazines.
Nope, only manned registers.
Try the back corner.

qaPairs.usageNote: 适合想快速结账的顾客提问
